description: Mediabridge Ultra Series RCA Y-Adapter - 1-Male to 2-FemaleA simple Y-Adapter can open up a whole new world of possibilities. Attach a second amplifier to your CD or DVD player for more power & dynamics in your favorite music. Connect a second subwoofer to your A/V receiver for true blockbuster bass from your home theater. The RCA Y-Adapter makes all of this easy, while maximizing signal transfer, so your audio components deliver all the performance you expect. Color-coded connectors make for easy distinguishing between polarities. Dual Shielding protects against RF/EM interference. ULTRA Series cables are made from premium materials for a pro-grade output.Product Features- Flexible outer jacket for easy installation- Gold contact, pro-grade connectors for a high conductivity connection- Y-Adapter has 1-Male to 2-Female RCA audio plugs- A strong metal build, meant for organizing & maintaining your audio/video network with quick access braided copper shielding, aluminum Mylar shielding, & gas-injected foam dielectric- Cable is 12IN in lengthCompatibilityDevices with RCA connectors, like TV's, CD/DVD players, subwoofers & amplifiersInstallationUsing existing RCA cables, connect 2 audio components to the 2 Female connectors, & then connect the 1 Male connector to a TV, CD/DVD player, A/V receiver or other RCA-enabled deviceWarrantyLimited 1 Year WarrantySupportCall us Mon-Sat 9AM-6PM Eastern (extended hours Tue/Thu until 9PM). Emails answered within 1 business day
title: Mediabridge ULTRA Series RCA Y-Adapter (12 Inches) - 1-Male to 2-Female for Digital Audio or Subwoofer
